languages.text: "А во-вторых, я выше тебя, Ульфар. И потому не прошу, но велю — подтверди свои хвастливые слова делом! Если стая Зловещий вой жива, как ты говоришь, пусть идет с Грозовыми укусами на штурм Ефрата-II и покажет там доблесть, приличествующую историям о них! Выдюжишь один за всех своих братьев? Или жила слаба?"

"And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"
languages.original_text: "А во-вторых, я выше тебя, Ульфар. И потому не прошу, но велю — подтверди свои хвастливые слова делом! Если стая Зловещий вой жива, как ты говоришь, пусть идет с Грозовыми укусами на штурм Ефрата-II и покажет там доблесть, приличествующую историям о них! Выдюжишь один за всех своих братьев? Или жила слаба?"

traits.locale_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Famehungry pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Famehungry pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Famehungry pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “其次，我是你的长官，乌尔法。我不是在请求你，而是在命令你，我要你用你的实际行动来支持你的论调！如果如你所言，怒嚎者狼群还活着，那就让它与噬风者一起进攻欧夫拉茨二号星，让我们看看它到底像不像无数故事中说得那么英勇！你愿意为了你的兄弟们孤军奋战吗？还是说，你的尖牙利爪已经钝了？”
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: “其次，我是你的长官，乌尔法。我不是在请求你，而是在命令你，我要你用你的实际行动来支持你的论调！如果如你所言，渴名者狼群还活着，那就让它与噬风者一起进攻欧夫拉茨二号星，让我们看看它到底想不想无数故事中说得那么英勇！你愿意为了你的兄弟们孤军奋战吗？还是说，你的尖牙利爪已经钝了？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「第二に、俺はお前の上司だ、ウルファー。お前の自慢話は行動で証明しろ。これは依頼ではない、命令だ！破滅の咆哮の群れがお前の言うように生きてるなら、ユーフラテス・IIへの攻撃の際は嵐喰いに加われ。そして話どおりの武勇を示せ！同胞全員のためにひとり立つのだろう？それとも腰がひけたか？」
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: 「第二に、俺はお前の上司だ、ウルファー。お前の自慢話は行動で証明しろ。これは依頼ではない、命令だ！破滅の咆哮の群れがお前の言うように生きてるなら、ユーフラテス・IIへの攻撃の際は嵐喰いに加われ。そして話どおりの武勇を示せ！同胞全員のためにひとり立つのだろう？それとも腰がひけたか？」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Y, por otra parte, soy tu superior, Ulfar. No te estoy pidiendo, sino ordenando que demuestres tu palabrería con hechos. Si la jauría del Aullido Torvo está viva como afirmas, que asalten Eufrates II con los Muerdetormentas. ¡Que hagan gala del valor que cuentan las historias! ¿Vas a jugarte el pellejo por tus hermanos? ¿O es que te has vuelto un blando?».
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: «Y, por otra parte, soy tu superior, Ulfar. No te estoy pidiendo, sino ordenando que demuestres tu palabrería con hechos. Si la manada de Hambrientos de Fama está viva como afirmas, que asalten Eufrates II con los Muerdetormentas. ¡Que hagan gala del valor que cuentan las historias! ¿Vas a jugarte el pellejo por tus hermanos? ¿O es que te has vuelto un blando?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « De plus, je suis ton supérieur, Ulfar. Je ne te demande donc pas de prouver ta prétendue valeur par des actes, mais je te l'ordonne ! Si les Hurleurs sanguinaires sont toujours vivants comme tu l'affirmes, qu'ils marchent aux côtés des Crocs de la tempête lors de l'assaut sur Euphrate-II pour démontrer que la bravoure qu'on leur prête n'est pas usurpée ! Vas-tu porter seul l'étendard de tous tes frères ? Ou as-tu perdu ton ardeur ? »
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: « De plus, je suis ton supérieur, Ulfar. Je ne te demande donc pas de prouver ta prétendue valeur par des actes, mais je te l'ordonne ! Si les Dévoreurs de gloire sont toujours vivants comme tu l'affirmes, qu'ils marchent aux côtés Crocs de la tempête lors de l'assaut sur Euphrate-II pour démontrer que la bravoure qu'on leur prête n'est pas usurpée ! Vas-tu porter seul l'étendard de tous tes frères ? Ou as-tu perdu ton ardeur ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Und zweitens bin ich Euch überlegen, Ulfar, und daher frage ich nicht, sondern ich befehle Euch, Euer Brustgetrommel mit Taten zu untermauern! Wenn das Baleful-Howl-Rudel lebt, wie Ihr sagt, dann soll es an der Seite der Stormbiters den Angriff auf Eufrates II ausführen, dann soll es die Tugend beweisen, von der alle Geschichten berichten! Werdet Ihr allein für all Eure Brüder kämpfen? Oder seid Ihr weich geworden?"
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem bin ich Euer Vorgesetzter, Ulfar, und es ist keine Bitte, sondern ein Befehl, dass Ihr Eure Drohgebärden durch Taten stützt! Wenn das Rudel der Famehungry am Leben ist, wie Ihr sagt, dann soll es mit den Stormbiters bei dem Angriff auf Eufrates II marschieren und den Mut beweisen, von dem die Geschichten berichten! Werdet Ihr alleine für all Eure Brüder eintreten? Oder seid Ihr weich geworden?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Ayrıca ben senin üstünüm Ulfar. Göğsünü döveceksen vazifelerini de yerine getirmeni emrediyorum! Uğursuz Uluma dediğin gibi yaşıyorsa Eufrates II saldırısında Borayutanlarla birlikte omuz omuza yürüsün, hikâyelerde sözü edilen yiğitliğini göstersin! Kardeşlerinin adına tek başına mı direneceksin? Yoksa öfkeni yitirdin mi?"
languages.original_text: "And secondly, I am your superior, Ulfar, and so I am not asking but ordering you to back up your chest-beating with deeds! If the Baleful Howl pack is alive as you say, let it march with the Stormbiters in the assault on Eufrates II, let it display the valour all the stories tell of! Will you stand alone for all your brothers? Or have you gone soft?"

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca ben senin üstünüm Ulfar. Göğsünü döveceksen görevlerini de yerine getirmeni emrediyorum! Uğursuz Uluma dediğin gibi yaşıyorsa Eufrates II saldırısında Borayutanlarla birlikte omuz omuza yürüsün, hikâyelerde sözü edilen yiğitliğini göstersin! Kardeşlerinin adına tek başına mı direneceksin? Yoksa öfkeni kaybettin mi?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
